text:
Fred Cole (August 28, 1948 – November 9, 2017) was an American rock singer-songwriter and guitarist. He played with several bands since the 1960s, most notably The Lollipop Shoppe, Dead Moon, and Pierced Arrows.
Cole died of liver disease on November 9, 2017 at his home in Clackamas, Oregon at the age of 69.
